Name: tracheomalacia
Definition: A tracheal disease characterized by flaccidity of the tracheal support cartilage.

Name: tracheal cancer
Definition: A respiratory system cancer that is located_in the trachea.

Name: tracheal calcification
Definition: A connective tissue disease characterized by bluish-brown discoloration of connective tissues that develops from the deposition of homogentisic acid and subsequent oxidation and polymerization reactions.

Name: trachea leiomyoma
Definition: A respiratory system benign neoplasm that derives_from smooth muscle cells and is located_in the trachea.

Name: obsolete infantile epileptic encephalopathy
Definition: A respiratory system benign neoplasm that derives_from smooth muscle cells and is located_in the trachea.

Name: tracheal stenosis
Definition: A spinal cord disease that is characterized by inflammation of the white matter or gray matter of the spinal cord.

Name: tracheitis
Definition: A tracheal disease which involves bacterial infection of the trachea often caused by Staphylococcus aureus and streptococci that follows a recent viral upper respiratory infection. The symptoms include barking croup cough
